1.content: tk, tai, and, matt wake to find that they're tied up to chairs. then....
1.title: the wake up

choices: While TK ate happily, Matt resisted.
Matt ate happily, but TK resisted.
Both boys resisted the food in front of their mouths.
15.content:
The three boys were quite surprised to see that they weren't facing an evil digimon or something like that in this situation, but instead, they were facing two of their friends, Sora and Kari.

"What is this? What are you two doing?" Tai demanded, quite angry.

Sora coolly responded "Oh, it's nothing. Kari and I just thought you boys were a bit too scrawny. The three of you could use some meat on your bones!"

Matt responded this time, saying, "But what if we don't want some meat on our bones?"

Sora then said "I guess that's why you're tied up, isn't it?"

Three stomach growls were heard from the boys. They were still hungry for breakfast.

"Looks like your stomachs want some meat on your bones!" Kari said playfully.

The two girls then pulled a cart with three large trays of breakfast foods, just for them.

Sora started to feed Matt, while Kari fed TK, saving Tai for last.

Either way...
15.title: An explanation

choices: kari brought tk to a room just for themselves
154.content:
As the girls fed the boys they squirmed and yelled. Tk even spit some of the food out.

For hours the girls cook burgers, spaghetti, hotdogs, ect., and stuffed Matt and tk.

"Please Kari stop!" Tk was taking the feeding worst then Matt.

After a few hours..
154.title: resistance

choices: Tried feeding TK some more. He hadn't eaten that much yet.
Tried to convince TK to comply, saying that it wouldn't be too bad.
Pulled out an amulet. She was going to try hypnosis.
1541.content:
"You're being difficult. This should be fun!" Kari said playfully, much to TK's horror. He didn't like this one bit. He felt helpless and scared.

Kari took him to an adjacent room, which only made TK feel worse. At least before, he knew that the others were in this with him, but now he was alone.

Kari then...
1541.title: A private room

15411.content:
Kari brought out a platter, lifted up the platter and revealed a big fat stuffed turkey. "Kari please, i'm full. I can't eat anymore." Tk words didn't stop her she tore off a leg and stuffed the entire leg in. He tossed in the chair, but it was futile. Kari kept feed him slices of turkey and stuffed a huge amount of stuffing in his mouth.

After an hour Kari stopped feeding because
15411.title: more feeding

choices: Tk gets special treatment from both girls
154111.content:
She ran out of food to feed Tk. Tk sighed in relief and rubbed his belly.

“I'll be right back.” Kari said.

She left the room a bit and Tk hoped there wasn’t any food to bring back. When Kari finally came back, she brought nothing back with her.

“By the looks of things, you and Matt ate everything we had for you boys.” Kari said.

She rubbed Tk’s swollen belly and loved how taut it was now. Tk was completely at ease that she won’t force him to eat anymore. He felt like he was going lose it all over Kari if she pushes a little harder on his belly. She let him go and hoped they find more food for their last one.
154111.title: ran out of food

1541112.content: When the girls are giving Tk the speashil treatment what happened to the other two?
1541112.title: Tk gets special treatment from both girls

15411121.content:
While Kari and Sora take care Tk, Tai and Matt plan their escape. They knew they had to be quick and soon for who knows how long this will last. Tk can tell they were going to make a run for it and bought them as much time as possible.

"Let's go now." Tai said.

They took off and hurried as fast as they could. Kari and Sora didn't notice for they were too busy with Tk. They fed him the tastiest foods they had and rubbed his belly as he ate away. Matt and Tai thought of what to do next. They couldn't decide if they should go back and get Tai or get help.
15411121.title: Escaped

choices: At least let the others go. I'll eat as much as you want me to if you do.
Just let me go. I'll help you feed the others if you do.
154112.content: Now that both TK and Matt were dazed, with taut bellies the size of beachballs, Kari and Sora were ready to feed Tai together. Tai was worried, both for his friends, and himself. He said, "Please stop! If you won't, then..."
154112.title: Tai's turn

choices: they decided to let tk and matt go (lie)
brought out matt and tk, and tortured tk in front of matt.
1541121.content:
"Please, I'll eat an elephant load if you want but only if you release both Matt and tk!!"

"Why should we, we could just keep unwillingly stuffing all three of you. Plus i'm having fun seeing tk plead for mercy" said a sadistic Kari. Sora stuffed a hotdog in tai's mouth and he slurped it up only to breath.

"OK, if you like unwillingness I act better than tk in that subject. JUST please let them go."

"Classic tai, trying to act brave and be leader. There's no way you can do better, tk young self makes it really fun." Said sora.

After a bit sora and Kari went to a different room and went they returned...
1541121.title: At least let the others go. I'll eat as muc...

choices: Tk and Matt try to escape
15411212.content:
The brought out Matt and Tk. To make things hard for them, Kari and Sora were going to torture Tk in front of Matt. They started to feed him without letting him breath. Matt struggled to get out. His taut belly made it hard for him to move much or get out. Kari and Sora kept feeding him and Matt only watched.

“That’s a good Tk, eat up and it’ll al be over.” Kari said sadistically.

Matt looked down and saw his brother's belly starting to push out. Matt was starting to get a little uncomfortable and hoped he could hold on. When he was as fat as he could get, he couldn’t get any more food into him. Kari and Sora was a little disappointed but got an idea. Sora got down on her knees in front of Tk and put her hands onto his belly. She started to rub it and Tk moaned in pain. She was pushing a little hard on him but she didn’t care. The newly sadistic Kari continued to feed him and Matt nearly lost all they forced him to eat.
15411212.title: brought out matt and tk, and tortured tk in fro...

choices: Kari and Sora start to feed Tai
154112122.content:
Kari and Sora both had to leave a bit to get some more food. Tk and Matt were both still tied up and sweating like hogs from all the feeding. They didn’t know how much more their bellies could take before they burst. They felt like the girls are actually trying to kill them.

“Don’t worry boys, we didn’t just leave you.” Kari said.

“We just needed to get more food for you.” Sora said.

Kari and Sora put the food down and made a couple more before they brought everything they were going to feed. Kari took Tk and Sora took Matt. Both girls started to feed them again and they tried to fight them. The girls overpowered the tied up boys easily and forced them to eat.

“Eat up my little piggy.” Kari said.

Kari shoved more and more food into Tk’s mouth with only her hands while Sora did the same to Matt. Sora started to hear Matt’s stomach rumbling with protest as it couldn’t take anymore. She put her hands onto his belly and felt it shaking. She looked at him and saw he will lose it if he eats anymore.

“If that little pig can’t eat anymore, then help me feed this little piggy.” Kari said.

Tk felt a little degraded every time Kari called him a pig. She and Sora kept feeding Tk with their bare hands and made sure he ate it all. When they were about out of food, Sora started to cook some more. Kari kept feeding him until they were out. Sora cooked up some hot dogs, spaghetti, hamburgers and many other things for the boys. They nearly forgot about Tai so Kari went to check on him. While she did that, Sora rubbed Tk’s belly to make sure it still has some give in it.

“Don’t worry little piggy, you’ll be nice and fat soon.” Sora said sadistically.

When it was all done, Kari got back and they started to feed Tk again. Matt continued to watch his brother get fatter and fatter in front of him. He thought the girls were insane for doing this to them and thought Tk was about to explode.
154112122.title: the girls push their limits

choices: TK gets a ton of attention from Kari
1541121222.content:
When the girls had finally fell asleep for the night, Tai managed to wiggle himself out of his binds and snuck over to Matt and TK. Kari was guarding both of them and was a fairly light sleeper. Tai quietly and easily moved her out of the way to open a path for his fat friends. He untied them and helped them up. TK was the fatter of the two and had a harder time walking. They took off and hoped the girls don’t notice.

“They got out. Let’s get them!” Kari shouted.

The boys hurried but Tai got a head of them. TK waddled as fast as he could but tripped. Kari caught up to him and rolled him over. She sat on his big belly to help keep him down. Sora got Matt but Tai got a way. They took them back to their camp and tied Matt back up. Instead of doing the same to TK, Kari took him to a special cage she had hidden away.

“Now be a good caged little boy and eat up.” Kari said.

Kari started to feed TK again and made it extra forceful and made him eat a ton for escaping. She kept this up until she thought TK had enough. She soon fell asleep next to the cage and dreamt of TK getting fatter. TK didn’t sleep the rest of the night for her was now afraid of Kari.
1541121222.title: Tai helps his friends escape

choices: Switch back to  Matt and Tai
15413.content:
Kari then Pulled out an amulet. She was going to try hypnosis him "What is that ? "asked TK looking that the amulet.it was a small golden amulet with a bright red crystal in the middle

"Just something at should help put some meat on your bones "replied Kari with a wide smirk while using her free handed to poke TK stomach "your stomach wont be so flat once am done with you " said Karl


"But i want my stomach to stay flat "said TK'with a scared expression but was quickly quited by Karl

"You wont feel like that much longer "said Karl as she started to place the amulet. around TK neck while the boy still struggled as Karl stood back and smiled "Ok TK your going to eat every single bit of food i place in your mouth "ordered Karl suddnly the crystal started glowing and TK eyes started glowing as well


"Are you going to do as i say ?"asked Karl seeing if the amulet had worked


"Yes"said TK under the amulet power


"Good "said Karl laughing as she grabbed a trolly full of food and grabbed a slice of cake and shoving it into TK mouth who happly eat it before Karl shoved more into his waiting mouth his belly filling with food
15413.title: Pulled out an amulet. She was going to try hypn...

choices: He tries to find out what happened to the girls
He goes off to find the kids who weren't at the cookout
He tries to find Agumon first
1543.content:
Sora and Kari were so busy feeding TK and Matt that they did not notice Tai wriggle out of his bonds and escape. Tai ran into the surrounding woods as fast as his skinny legs could carry him. In retrospect, it was probably a bit cruel of him to ditch his friends, but he didn't care in the heat of the moment.

Tai didn't know what happened to Sora and Kari to change their behavior so drastically or where the other kids and the Digimon were. He was determined to find out. But what would he do first?
1543.title: tai escaped

15431.content:
Tai tries to find out what happened to the girls to do this to them. He quietly snuck back to the area where they were at and looked around for any clues. He didn’t find anything until he looked at the back of Sora’s neck. It looked like to be a tattoo of her Digimon. Tai looked at Kari and saw the same thing.

“Their Digimon must have gained a new ability or something and fused with them.” Tai said quietly.

Matt and Tk saw their friend hiding in the bush and wanted him to save them. Kari and Sora noticed that they were starring passed them and into the bushes. Tai took off running from them as soon as they turned around. The girls took off after him and hoped to catch them. Tai didn’t know if he could out run them but tried.
15431.title: He tries to find out what happened to the girls

choices: Kari and Sora do the same to Matt and TK
Sora makes the other boys eat to their limits
154311.content:
It took Kari and Sora an hour to catch Tai and drag him back. They made sure that his ropes were super tight so he doesn’t escape again. Kari and Sora started to feed him and made sure he ate it all. They kept feeding him and watched him fatten up like a balloon. They loved how big he is getting and loved how soft his large belly was getting. Kara felt super attracted to him and got to her knees in front of Tai.

“No more, I can’t eat anymore.” Tai pleaded.

“Just a little more and you’ll be fine Tai.” Sora said.

Kari started to rub Tai’s belly and loved how soft it was. Sora kept feeding him and made sure he was stuffed to burst. Kari made sure he was lose and comfortable as she got some things ready. When she finished, she fed Tai a little more to make sure he is fat enough.

“Now for a sweet little piggy pie for me.” Kari said.

She then took care of Tai up until his body completely failed him. Kari cleaned up his body and stuffed it up a bit. She cooked it up into a pie and at it. She loved how sweet and loved how he was nice to her before she cooked him. The pie was quite large and meat filled from Tai being so big and fat. Kari finished the pie and rubbed her swollen belly.

“Tai tasted better than he looked fat.” Kari said.

She got up and found Sora. She was feeding the other boys.
154311.title: Kari and Sora catch Tai

choices: They turn Matt into a Matt burger
1543111.content:
Kari waddled back to where Sora, Matt and TK were at. She nearly lost her balance with her new weight but got use to it. Sora noticed that her friend enjoyed herself with Tai and had a quick ‘snack’ afterward. The girls started to feed the boys with the food that Sora had made while Kari was taking care of Tai.

“By the way, what did you do to our little Tai anyway?” Sora asked.

“Well, after you left, I made sure Tai was nice and fat before cooking him up in a nice pie.” Kari said.

The girls hand feed the boys and fed them big hand full’s of food. When TK felt like he was going to explode. He started to cry in pain from all the food the girls were feeding him. Kari made sure he kept eating as she evilly laughed. Sora kept feeding large amounts of handfuls to Matt. Matt started to scream at her to stop feeding her but she didn’t. They fought the girls for a while longer until they were unable to do so.

“If you keep eating TK, I’ll give you a special treat later.” Kari said evilly.

TK kept crying but knew that she can be trusted. He didn’t stop crying but he kept eating everything Kari fed him. When TK’s belly wasn’t able to take much more so Kari rubbed it a bit. She laughed evilly again and forced him to eat more. When TK wasn’t able to take much more, his belly button popped out and Kari poked it. She then shrank him down to fit onto the top of the pizza she was going to make. Kari kept a tight grip on small TK in one hand and made the pizza on the other. She found it convenient for his small baseball size and hoped he doesn’t lose it on her hand.

When she finished the first layer of cheese done, Kari put TK on it and made sure he filled out the pizza. He struggled to get out but Kari put a thick layer of cheese on and it was super sticky from how thick and melted it is. Kari smiled at him and made him a little bigger. When TK filled out the pizza enough, she made Matt finish the pizza. He kept screaming not to cook him but Kari and Sora forced him to do so and put him into the oven. He tried to escape but Sora tied him down.

“He smells delicious. I can’t wait until we get to Matt here.” Sora said. “Just like Tai, I want you to eat him.”

Sora patted her friends belly and liked how it jiggled. Kari took the TK pizza out and put the final toppings on before putting it back into the oven to finish. TK was somehow still alive and bubbling up. Kari watched him bubble up until he was about to pop. When the cheese was golden yellow and the crust was a crisp brown, Kari pulled the pizza out and smelled it. She poked it a bit to make sure it was ready and TK was gone. She then cut it into pieces. She offered a couple to Sora but she wanted Kari to eat it. She was still a little full from having the wonderful Tai pie she had earlier but at it anyway.

After a couple slightest, Kari looked at Matt and forced him to eat a couple. Matt didn’t like it and soon felt like he was going to explode. Sora had a piece and liked it. She had a couple more before letting Kari eat the rest.
1543111.title: TK Pizza

choices: No (RC on what's REALLY going on)
154312.content:
As Tai ran, he suddenly felt guilty about leaving his friends behind earlier. So he made a sharp turn back towards them. This startled the girls and made them trip. They quickly got to their feet, but Tai was already undoing Matt's bonds. The ropes were incredibly tight, but he managed to undo them. Matt's first course of action as a free man was to remove the bindings from his younger brother. They all managed to hightail it into the woods, narrowly avoiding getting captured again.

"Guys!" Tai said. "I think the girls fused with their Digimon with some weird attack! That's why they're stuffing us!"

But was he right?
154312.title: Guilt Complex

choices: Tai helps Matt and TK escape
1543121.content:
Tai was right. Kari’s and Sora’s Digimon had mysteriously disappeared and nowhere to be found. They heard Kari and Sora coming and Tai took off to hide. They brought some more food and started to feed Matt and TK. Kari looked around to find her brother but couldn’t find him.

“Don’t worry Kari, your brother will soon show up.” Sora said.

“He better, I want to fatten him up like Matt and TK.” Kari said.

“I think you just want to hold his belly and jump on it and keep him to yourself.”

“Yep!”

The girls fed the brothers more as Tai watched from the bushes. He was a little disgusted at what they were doing to his friends and wanted to do something. When the girls turned around, TK and Matt saw what Tai mentioned. Their Digimon are fused with them and that is definitely the reason they’re stuffing them. When the brothers were unable to eat anymore, Sora and Kari wanted to find Tai but waited until morning to do so.
1543121.title: Yes

choices: Sora and Kari catch their runaways
15431212.content:
Tai wanted to save his friends but with Sora and Kari hovering over the and constantly feeding them made it nearly impossible to do so. So Tai got a little more distance away from the area and waited. When night came, he waited another hour after dark to move closer. When he got to the area, he saw that both Kari and Sora were asleep and away from Matt and TK. He went to the girls and confirmed that the girls had the tattoo of their Digimon on the back of their necks. He then went to his two friends and woke them up.

“What took you so long?” Matt asked.

“Yeah, we took too much. I feel like I’m going to explode if they didn’t stop and fall asleep.” TK said.

“Sorry, I had to wait to the right moment to save you.” Tai said.

He untied his friends and helped them up. He noticed how much fatter they area and they told him that the girls over fed them. They waddled away behind Tai as they made their way out of their torment site. They were unaware that Kari has woken up and found their captives gone. She managed to spot TK’s large backside as he waddles away. She tried to wake up Sora but she wouldn’t budge. So Kari just watched their captives escape.
15431212.title: Tai helps Matt and TK escape

choices: Kari gets hungry for one of the boys
154312121.content:
After getting Sora up, Kari told her everything that just happened. Sora was furious about that and they went to find their captives. They soon found TK past out under a tree. There was no sign of Matt or Tai but they had to be near but they wouldn’t come back for him any time soon for him now. Sora took him back to the camp and started the feeding process on him again. Kari looked for her brother and Matt for it was their turn to be caught and taken back. So she bid her time looking for them and knew they would turn up eventually. Knowing how fat Matt is there is a high chance shell finds him next. It didn’t take long before she did and took him back. She didn’t find her brother but with both Matt and TK back, it’s better than nothing. They made sure the boys were bound tightly this time and started to feed them. Matt and TK tried to plead with them and would help find Tai but Kari and Sora didn’t want to listen.

“He’ll soon turn up.” Sora said.

“Knowing my big brother, he’ll have to show up to see me again.” Kari said.

They kept feeding the boys pies and burgers to ensure they get more than enough fattening food in them. After a while, Kari felt something in her that she never felt before. If felt like she needs to fill herself with something. She felt hungry but the hunger wasn’t from her stomach for both she and Sora just at shortly before searching for the boys and just before stuffing them. It felt like it was coming just below her stomach in her young womanhood. Sora told her that she feels the same thing and got an idea. Despite being young, they would fill their hunger away that any other woman would do. They kept the boys tied up while they got stripped. The girls got down undressed in front of them and rod their members for a while. They then went back to stuffing the boys. Instead of putting their clothes back on, Kari and Sora used their figures on the boys by only dressing them and feeding them more pies and burgers. This went on all day until the girls had enough and put their clothes on. Once again, Tai showed up that night to rescue them but was unable to.
154312121.title: Sora and Kari catch their runaways

1543121212.content:
It’s been a couple days since Kari and Sora lost and recaptured TK and Matt and all they did was just fatten them up. Getting fed up with looking and waiting for her brother, Kari wanted to know what a fat boy tastes like. Looking at TK and Matt, she couldn’t decide which one to eat first.TK was the fatter of the two and could be super juicy but Matt looked to be the tastiest. Unable to decide who, she fattened them up a little more to the point that if they try to escape, they can’t move much or fast if they could move at all. Their shirts were rolled off their bellies from their weight gain which gave Kari an idea to try. She was going to taste the boys before deciding.

“Lets see who tastes better.” Kari said.

Before she did, Sora came and looked at her friend. Kari told Sora her plan with the boys. The plan was that she was going to lick their bellies to see who is the tastiest to eat. Sora insisted that she goes for TK first but she wants to try for herself. She got in front of TK and licked his belly. She did the same to Matt and made her final decision. The first one she was going to eat was…
1543121212.title: Kari gets hungry for one of the boys

15431212121.content:
The larger of the two, TK. She wants to see what fat boys taste like and with TK will be the perfect ‘feast’ for her. She told Matt that Sora will be taking good care of him for the time being. Kari started to clean TK up before she started to feed him again. This went on for a week until Kari thought he was fat enough.

“Kari, are you worried about becoming too fat?” Sora asked.

“We’ll worry about that when it happens.” Kari replied.

Looking at TK again, she couldn’t decide on what to eat him as. She made a list of food that he would be best as and narrowed it down to some of the things she thought best. Her list consisted of a burger, a pie, pizza and a few other things. She couldn’t decide until she finally decided on…
15431212121.title: TK

1543121212122.content: Let’s go with a pie?
1543121212122.title: No

choices: Kari and Sora catch their escapee
15431212121221.content:
A nice and delicious TK pie. She knew he was going to be a great pie, so full of meat and fat, while being super sweet for her. She got everything prepared to cook him and fattened him up some more. When he was at least 500 pounds, Kari knew he was ready.

“Time for your final preparations.” Kari said.

TK looked at her and saw she got a couple more things for her to stuff him with. The stuffing consisted of meat, some turkey stuffing and what looks to him to be ice cream and cream. She stuffed it all in and TK moaned in pain from all this. He rubbed as much of his large belly as he could to ease the pain away before he gets cooked. She then lined the large pan before getting him into it. It was a struggle but Kari got him into the large fire to cook him after putting the top dough over him and filling the pie with some extra stuff. When her TK pie was done, Kari pulled it out and smelt it.

“I knew he was going to come out delicious.” Kari said.

She started to dig in and loved it. Kari ate it over the next few days until she finished the entire pie. Now with TK resting in pieces in her stomach, she was satisfied from her hunger to eat some one for now. She found Sora and Matt a little ways away. Sora was enjoying herself feeding Matt and fattening him up. Kari let her have her fun and went to rest for a while and digest her contents. She rubbed her stuffed belly while she slept and loved how full and round it is. She fell asleep with her hand on her belly and dreamt of how great TK tasted and wondered what Matt and Tai tasted like.
15431212121221.title: Lets go with this

choices: Sora has some fun with Tai
154312121212211.content:
It’s been a couple days since Tai tried to take their captives and TK has finally been completely digested by her. Now he’s part of her and is her fat which she liked. Now that he’s part of her and Matt is on his way of joining him, there was the question of where is Tai? Kari put Sora in charge of watching Matt and fattening him up for her while she went to look for him. She gave up after a couple hours and went back to Sora.

“Find him yet Kari?” Sora asked.

“No, not yet. He has to be nearby for food we haven’t eaten or fed to TK or Matt has been going missing.” Kari said.

Both girls went looking for Tai and soon found him. He was a little fat from eating so much of the food he has stolen from them. They tied him up for now until they decided on his fate. They told Matt that he has been spared for now. Kari took the recaptured Tai and decided that she will take care of him. Sora went back to Matt and rubbed his belly for she likes how big it is. Kari stripped Tai down to nothingness and she looked at all his naked glory. She started to force feed him a ton of food and would occasionally arouse him so she could rape him later. She did this all day and, before she threw him into his cage, she rode him long and hard. She completely tied him up so he doesn’t escape again and threw him into his cage. Kari knew she was going to have fun with this one before she ‘disposes’ of him.
154312121212211.title: Kari and Sora catch their escapee

1543121212122111.content:
Kari liked having both of their escapees back but wants her brother Tai back so she could punish him for escaping and trying to take their other 2 captives. She and Sora kept feeding T.K. and Matt and fattening them up to their pleasure. After a couple days, Kari looked at Matt and liked what she was seeing. She had this hunger to eat him and knew she was going to have a feast with him.

“Now, how should I eat him? I could just eat him as is.” Kari said.

“May I suggest eating as a delicious burger or pie?” Sora asked.

“Please don’t eat me. I’ll help bring back Tai.” Matt pleaded.

“Too late, you know not to keep a girl waiting for anything, especially food when she’s hungry.”

Kari thought of how to eat Matt while Sora had some fun with T.K. like playing with his fat and fattening him up. As she thought, many ideas came to mind. She decided not to eat him plan like he is now but as something delicious meal, but what. Then she decided on…
1543121212122111.title: Kari eats Matt

154312121212212.content:
When Kari had finally digested her TK pie, she gained a little bit of fat and likes it. She weighed herself and the scale read she was at 300 pounds. Most of her weight is on her belly and butt but she didn’t mind it for she knew she was going to get fatter. Sora went off somewhere without telling her leaving only her to take care of Matt. Every day, Kari fed Matt a boat load of food and made sure they were super fattening. Matt lost all hope in being saved by Tai now and just gave in to his fate.

“You’re just the best looking one yet.” Kari said. “Much better than your brother TK.”

Kari finished feeding one evening, Kari rubbed Matt’s large belly. She guessed he had to be at least 500 pounds, if not fatter. She knew he will be as great as his older brother, maybe even tastier than TK. His large belly was completely exposed and was shiny form all the sweet on it. Kari licked his belly and loved how it tasted.

“You’re about ready for my stomach.” Kari said.

“Please don’t eat me. I’ll do what you want.” Matt pleaded.

“You should have thought of that before you and TK tried to escape with that traitorous Tai.”

Kari got him down to nothing and had some fun with him. She knew that by eating him, he wouldn’t get the pleasure to actually ‘pleasure’ a woman when older or ‘fill her other hunger’ or have a family. So she played with his young member and let him relieve himself into her. When she had her fun on him, she went back to stuffing him the next day. After a couple more days, Kari knew he was ready. Going over her list, Kari decided to eat him as…
154312121212212.title: Kari goes after Matt next

choices: Like older brother, like younger brother

154312121212212222.content: Does Kari just eats him as is?
